videos.description: DeAndre Jordan's block on Terrence Ross sets up Carmelo Anthony's 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo turns DJ's block into a 3) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo turns DJ's block into a 3

videos.description: LeBron James swats R.J. Hampton from behind and hits Dikembe Mutombo's famous finger wag.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron channels Mutombo on chase-down block) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron channels Mutombo on chase-down block

videos.description: LeBron James is fired up after getting an and-1 to fall.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron flexes on Magic after tough and-1) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron flexes on Magic after tough and-1

videos.description: Russell Westbrook falls after a layup attempt and Lakers surround him as he limps to the locker room for the halftime break.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Westbrook limps to locker room after last-second layup attempt) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Westbrook limps to locker room after last-second layup attempt

videos.description: Russell Westbrook dimes LeBron James on the fast break for a rim-rocking slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron turns back the clock on thunderous throwdown) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron turns back the clock on thunderous throwdown

videos.description: LeBron James sends Cole Anthony's shot flying.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron obliterates Cole Anthony's shot) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron obliterates Cole Anthony's shot

videos.description: DeAndre Jordan takes flight for an alley-oop flush on Robin Lopez.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (DJ caps off Lakers' 23-0 run with slam on Lopez) 2021/12/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: DJ caps off Lakers' 23-0 run with slam on Lopez

videos.description: LeBron James drops 30 points, dishes 10 assists and grabs 11 rebounds in the Lakers' big win.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LeBron turns back time with triple-double in win vs. Magic) 2021/12/13 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: LeBron turns back time with triple-double in win vs. Magic
